title: Understanding Tables in Excel
text: Tables in Excel are more than just a way to organize data. They offer specific functionalities that can enhance data management and analysis.

title: Benefits of Using Tables
text: Consider how tables can help in sorting, filtering, and applying formulas to data independently from the rest of the worksheet.

hintAnswer: you can manage and analyze the data in that table, independently from the rest of the worksheet
title: Key Features of Excel Tables
text: What are some key features of Excel tables that make them useful for data management?
choices: you can manage and analyze the data in that table, independently from the rest of the worksheet
you can use table functions which are more important than worksheet functions
